trans-unit.source: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format images.
trans-unit.target: 定義編碼器以用來編碼可攜式網路圖形 (PNG) 格式影像。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] format bitmaps support frame level metadata.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 格式的點陣圖支援畫面格層級中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: They do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: 它們不支援預覽、 全域縮圖、 框架層級的縮圖、 全域中繼資料或多個框架。

trans-unit.source: Encoding does not work in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 編碼不在部分信任中運作。

trans-unit.source: See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)的部分信任的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngBitmapEncoder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngBitmapEncoder" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngBitmapEncoder> to encode a new bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngBitmapEncoder>至新的點陣圖影像編碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] bitmap should interlace.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否應該對 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 點陣圖進行交錯處理。

trans-unit.source: Interlacing refers to the process of displaying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] frame in two fields.
trans-unit.target: 交錯式顯示的程序是指[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]兩個欄位中的框架。

trans-unit.source: One field contains the even lines of the frame, and the other field contains the odd lines of the frame.
trans-unit.target: 一個欄位包含偶數行範圍內，而另一個欄位包含奇數行的畫面格。

trans-unit.source: When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] is viewed, the lines in one field are displayed first, and then the lines in the second field are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]是檢視，一個欄位中的程式會先顯示，並且第二個欄位中的行就會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngBitmapEncoder.Interlace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngBitmapEncoder.Interlace%2A>屬性。
